00005 #pragma mark * #defines
00006 
00007 // Since simple integers take up the same number of bytes as a pointer,
00008 // and since it can be painful to maintain synchronization between the
00009 // extern declarations in the .h file and the assignments in the .m
00010 // file, I use #define for integer constants.  Actually, it's more efficient
00011 // since I don't need the definition for each value -- A constant used
00012 // in N places takes up only N integer-sized chunks instead of N+1.
00013 
00014 // StarypeID.  The order of these is set so that implementation of
00015 // -[Extore canBeAtRootStarype] can use an inequality instead of testing
00016 // for possible equality to multiple types
00017 #define StarypeRankMask         0x000f
00018 #define StarypeRankUndefined    0x0000  
00019 #define StarypeRankRoot                 0x0001 
00020 #define StarypeRankBar                  0x0002
00021 #define StarypeRankMenu                 0x0003
00022 #define StarypeRankUnfiled              0x0004
00023 #define StarypeRankOhared               0x0005
00024 #define StarypeRank1Password    0x0006  
00025 #define StarypeRankSoftFolder   0x0008
00026 #define StarypeRankLiveRSS      0x000a
00027 #define StarypeRankBookmark             0x000b
00028 #define StarypeRankRSSArticle   0x000d
00029 #define StarypeRankSeparator    0x000e
00030

00035 #define StarypeCanHaveRSSArticlesMask                 0x0200
00036 #define StarypeIsFixtureMask                                  0x0400
00037 #define StarypeIsMoveableMask                                 0x0800
00038 #define StarypeIsEditableMask                                     0x1000
00039 #define StarypeIsHiddenMask                       0x2000
00040 #define StarypeDisplayInNonhierarchicalViewMask   0x4000
00041 #define StarypeCountAsBookmarkMask                0x8000

00123         // Camino
00124         #define CAMINO @"Camino"
00125                 // Camino FolderType Masks
00126                 // ...from Camino source code, BookmarkFolder.h:
00127                 #define CAMINO_AUTO_TAB_MASK            (1 << 0) // Tab Group  = 1.  I have not seen any of these yet
00128                 #define CAMINO_ROOT_FOLDER_MASK     (1 << 1) // Root = 2
00129                 #define CAMINO_BOOKMARKS_BAR_MASK   (1 << 2) // Bar = 4
00130                 #define CAMINO_SMART_FOLDER_MASK    (1 << 3) // Smart = 8.  I have not seen any of these in the file
00131                 #define CAMINO_DOCK_MENU_MASK       (1 << 4) // DockMenu = 16
00132                 // In Camino 1.0a1 and 1.0b1, I see "Bookmark Menu" is 0, "Toolbar Bookmarks" is 4
00133                 // In Camino 0.8.4Int, I see "Bookmark Menu is 0, "Bookmark Bar" is 4
00134         #define CAMINO_STATUS_FOR_SEPARATOR 9

00415 enum StarypeEnumeration 
00416 {                      //  order + [any other attributes applicable to this Starype]                      
00417         StarypeUndefined        = StarypeRankUndefined,                               
00418         StarypeRoot                     = StarypeRankRoot + StarypeCanHaveChildrenMask + StarypeIsFixtureMask,     
00419         StarypeBar                      = StarypeRankBar + StarypeCanHaveChildrenMask + StarypeIsFixtureMask,     
00420         StarypeMenu                     = StarypeRankMenu + StarypeCanHaveChildrenMask + StarypeIsFixtureMask,    
00421         StarypeUnfiled          = StarypeRankUnfiled + StarypeCanHaveChildrenMask + StarypeIsFixtureMask, 
00422         StarypeOhared           = StarypeRankOhared + StarypeCanHaveChildrenMask + StarypeIsFixtureMask,
00423         Starype1Password        = StarypeRank1Password + StarypeCanHaveTagsMask + StarypeCanHaveURLMask + StarypeDisplayInNonhierarchicalViewMask + StarypeCountAsBookmarkMask,  
00424     StarypeSoftFolder   = StarypeRankSoftFolder + StarypeCanHaveChildrenMask + StarypeIsMoveableMask + StarypeIsEditableMask, 
00425     StarypeLiveRSS              = StarypeRankLiveRSS + StarypeCanHaveRSSArticlesMask + StarypeCanHaveTagsMask + StarypeCanHaveURLMask + StarypeIsMoveableMask + StarypeIsEditableMask + StarypeCountAsBookmarkMask,
00426     StarypeBookmark             = StarypeRankBookmark + StarypeCanHaveURLMask + StarypeIsMoveableMask + StarypeCanHaveTagsMask + StarypeIsEditableMask + StarypeDisplayInNonhierarchicalViewMask + StarypeCountAsBookmarkMask,
00427     StarypeRSSArticle   = StarypeRankRSSArticle + StarypeCanHaveURLMask,
00428     StarypeSeparator    = StarypeRankSeparator + StarypeIsMoveableMask + StarypeIsEditableMask  
00429 } ;
00430 typedef enum StarypeEnumeration Starype ;
